json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes">

<prop type="array" name="vpnClientProtocols">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientRevokedCertificates">

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="">

help.short: Autonomous System Number to use for the BGP settings.
IP address to use for BGP peering.
Weight (0-100) added to routes learned through BGP peering.
Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
The resource GUID property of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientAddressPool.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="VPN Client" singularOptions="address-prefix">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols" options="client-protocol" group="VPN Client">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies" options="vpn-client-ipsec-policies" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates" options="vpn-client-revoked-certificates" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">

command.name: update

argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Name or ID of a local network gateway representing a local network site with default routes.
Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.
Autonomous System Number to use for the BGP settings.
IP address to use for BGP peering.
Weight (0-100) added to routes learned through BGP peering.
Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

command.argGroup: <arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates" options="vpn-client-root-certificates" group="Root Cert Authentication">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientAddressPool.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="VPN Client" singularOptions="address-prefix">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols" options="client-protocol" group="VPN Client">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies" options="vpn-client-ipsec-policies" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates" options="vpn-client-revoked-certificates" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
